attributes.action: petition against planning permission, urbanisation and settlement of the green belt land on Southend Road, Corringham
attributes.additional_details: Thurrock County Council has received a planning application for permission for the siting of four caravans, four utility blocks and space for touring caravans and cars, fencing and the construction of three stables on the Green Belt Land adjacent Willow Cottage on Southend Road Corringham (5 Bells) It is felt that if permission is granted this will increase urbanisation and settlement and will be detrimental to the local wildlife and area and the loss of another beautiful piece of landscape in our area. We would like the Government to reject the planning application submitted on this land.
